author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-6714: RuntimeInfoTest failed with insufficient data from server
Tighten up checks for sessions being closed while reading runtime info from
them, in order to protect against NullPointerExceptions on the server.

author: arkurth
msg: Added code to utils.pm::get_request_by_computerid to check if a reservation assigned to the computer was deleted if the request info could not be retrieved.
Added $no_cache argument to call to get_vmhost_info in get_computer_info. Assumption is if $no_cache is passed to get_computer_info, the vmhost info it retrieves should also not be cached.
Added $no_cache argument to get_database_table_columns for testing.
